div.head: 皮膚乾閉
div.div: the skin is desiccated and blocked

bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

entry.def: the skin is desiccated and blocked

sense.def: Illness Sign of a skin that contains depressed fire heat and cannot sweat. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Shi ji 十 劑 , LSZ: 裏閉者，火熱鬱抑，津液不行，皮膚乾閉 , “In the case of internalobstruction, fire heat is pent-up, the bodily liquids cannot pass, the skin is desiccated and blocked ”.
